body:
> One way to do this would be to allow an executable to be named before 
> options with the oconv, mkillum, and pfilt variables.
I thought about this, still I am a bit worried that this may break 
existing scenes' rif-files.


It would be much better not to add all those variables but extend the 
existing ones, of course.


CU Lars.
___
